definition: to have a whole new level of respect for sb or sth/to sit up and take notice (of sb's improved performance etc)
to scrape/to blow/to shave/to plunder/to extort
to blow (of the wind)
eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard

sentences.english: You’re no doubt looking at the sandwich of the future.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，你对这种未来的三明治当刮目相看。

sentences.english: In spite of her young age, she often dazzles us with her wit.
sentences.chinese: 别看她小小年纪，但机智聪明，常让我们刮目相看。

sentences.english: His achievement make many people sit up and notice.
sentences.chinese: 他的成就让很多人刮目相看。

sentences.english: The sea on the reef vowed to love, I also look on the reef.
sentences.chinese: 大海对礁石矢志不渝的爱，令我对礁石也刮目相看。

sentences.english: The sea on the reef vowed to love, I also look on the reef .
sentences.chinese: 大海对礁石矢志不渝的爱，令我对礁石也刮目相看。

sentences.english: tATu's stage and video performances are always giving shock to the world!
sentences.chinese: tATu的舞台演出和录像表演都让世界刮目相看。

sentences.english: Seven treasures smell lecture, can not aid a rightness finish gram the in assorted light get up.
sentences.chinese: 七宝闻言，不禁对毕克刮目相看起来。

sentences.english: But at the same time we felt like we wanted to prove something.
sentences.chinese: 但与此同时，我们觉得应当让别人对我们刮目相看。

sentences.english: The performance of the equity markets has also been impressive.
sentences.chinese: 资本市场的表现也让人刮目相看。

sentences.english: The school's exam results are impressive.
sentences.chinese: 学校的考试成绩然人刮目相看。

to feel deep veneration for sb (idiom)

(to gasp) with admiration
to be full of praise (idiom)
to convince/to subdue/to be convinced/to be bowled over
to consider oneself as being not as good as the others
to admire greatly

to esteem/to admire
to exclaim in astonishment
